author: Staff Reporter
text:
Indian Coast Guard personnel attached to the Tuticorin station organised a walkathon here on Saturday to mark the anniversary of the 39th Coast Guard Day with the theme ‘Protection of Environment, Save Mother Earth”.

M. Gunasekaran, General Manager, Tamilnad Mercantile Bank limited, flagged off the walkathon in the presence of Commandant, S. Raja Nagendra, Coast Guard, Tuticorin Station. The programme was aimed at promoting clean and green environment. The walkathon began near Shrine Basilica, Our Lady of Snows on Beach Road and ended at Roche Park.

Around 250 participants, including Coast Guard personnel and students of various educational institutions, participated in the programme. The personnel also launched a bike rally, which commenced in Chennai on February 1.

The bike rally would reach Kanyakumari on February 8 and conclude at Colachel on the next day. The rally was received by Collector M. Ravikumar in the presence of Superintendent of Police Ashwin M. Kotnis here on Saturday.
title: Walkathon by ICG personnel
